messages.title: Don’t our children deserve better?
messages.content: "83% of schools will be worse off next year than they were in 2015" - National Education Union, October 2019

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats propose to reverse severe cuts by investing an extra £10billion in schools, recruiting 20,000 more teachers nationwide, providing £10billion extra cash injection for schools, and increasing funding for youth services.

issues.brexitEurope: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos. It has become a national embarrassment. Vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit. Once we stop Brexit, we can tackle the climate emergency and inequality, properly fund schools and the NHS, and create opportunity for all.
issues.education: The Liberal Democrats will invest an extra £10billion in schools and recruit 20,000 more teachers.

quotes.text: 83% of schools will be worse off next year than they were in 2015.
